thread.title: Prince Ali says election delay would further discredit FIFA
thread.title_full: Prince Ali says election delay would further discredit FIFA

author: wtopstaff
title: Prince Ali says election delay would further discredit FIFA
text:
Home » News » Sports » Prince Ali says election… Prince Ali says election delay would further discredit FIFA By ROB HARRIS October 14, 2015 3:01 am Prince Ali of Jordan waves at fans of the national team during the 2018 FIFA World Cup, Group B, qualifying soccer match between Jordan and Australia in Amman, Jordan, Thursday, Oct. 8 , 2015. (AP Photo/Raad Adayleh) 
ZURICH (AP) — FIFA presidential contender Prince Ali bin al-Hussein says the governing body would be further discredited if the emergency election was delayed. 
FIFA’s executive committee, where the Jordanian royal was a member until May, could decide at next week’s meeting to postpone the scheduled Feb. 26 poll. 
FIFA is under the acting presidency of Issa Hayatou, who temporily took the role Thursday when Sepp Blatter was suspended for at least 90 days pending the outcome of an investigation into alleged wrongdoing. 
Prince Ali said Wednesday that “with FIFA’s crisis deepening, the organization needs to move beyond interim leadership and elect an accountable president.” 
The prince added that delaying the election would “create further instability” and signal that the secret deals that “discredited FIFA in the first place continue.” Topics:
